actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To require gifts of less than $100 to be disregarded in determining income under the supplemental security income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to require gifts of less than $100 to be disregarded in determining income under the SSI program.

titles.title: To require gifts of less than $100 to be disregarded in determining income under the supplemental security income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.
